content: And then as we think about the pricing increases that I noted, we would expect because the first quarter is pretty light volumes in our business, and we really start to see, again, on a volumetric basis, if we raise, whether it’s aggregates, asphalt, ready-mix, that will be -- come into play more as we sell volumes, which are more second quarter and growing, certainly strongest in the third quarter and then we start tapering off somewhere around Thanksgiving time.
